definitions.definition: A deity or spirit serving as a guardian or protector of a place, person, culture, etc.; a tutelar, a tutelary deity.

definitions.example: When a minor is involved, tutelary powers frequently accompany powers of attorney.

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to a guardian.
definitions.example: My uncle is always happy to discharge his tutelary responsibilities towards me.

definitions.definition: Having the qualities of a tutor.
